heading: HR00906
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, TO ENSURE
THE CONTINUED SAFE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE MANDATED
NATIONAL IMMUNIZATION PROGRAM (NIP) FOR CHILDREN DESPITE
THE CHALLENGES POSED BY THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, AND, TO
SECURE AND ENSURE A STABLE SUPPLY OF AVAILABLE VACCINES
THROUGH CONTINUED CONDUCT OF OPEN, FAIR, AND COMPETITIVE
BIDDING, THEREBY PREVENTING OUTBREAKS OF VACCINE
PREVENTABLE DISEASES DURING THE TIME OF THIS PANDEMIC
(“OUTBREAK WITHIN AN OUTBREAK”)
principal-authors: DE JESUS, PRESLEY CHENG; DAGOOC, SERGIO C.; GUYA, GODOFREDO N.; EBCAS, ADRIANO A.;
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00906
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, TO ENSURE THE CONTINUED SAFE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE MANDATED NATIONAL IMMUNIZATION PROGRAM (NIP) FOR CHILDREN DESPITE THE CHALLENGES POSED BY THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, AND, TO SECURE AND ENSURE A STABLE SUPPLY OF AVAILABLE VACCINES THROUGH CONTINUED CONDUCT OF OPEN, FAIR, AND COMPETITIVE BIDDING, THEREBY PREVENTING OUTBREAKS OF VACCINE PREVENTABLE DISEASES DURING THE TIME OF THIS PANDEMIC (“OUTBREAK WITHIN AN OUTBREAK”)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DE JESUS, PRESLEY CHENG, DAGOOC, SERGIO C., GUYA, GODOFREDO N., EBCAS, ADRIANO A.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-26
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-05-28
